summary: Adds 4 new versions of Candlelight (Apprentice, Adept, Expert and Master) and 3 version of Magelight (Adept, Expert and Master) to vendors and loot lists. Recommended for those using the darker nights/darker dungeons mods who are frustrated with the weakness of the light spells.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 7 new light spells with increased light radii as the spells become more powerful.

Adds:

Versions of Candlelight:

Torchlight (Apprentice)
Glowlight (Adept)
Flarelight (Expert)
Sunlight (Master)

Versions of Magelight:

Magefire (Adept)
Beacon (Expert)
Radiance (Master)

All spell tomes have been added to the leveled lists for spell loot and vendor lists. I can confirm you may purchase all of them from Tolfdir in the College of Winterhold.

This is the second version, I aim to add additional spells that combine light with scaring away light-sensitive creatures, such as spiders.

This archive includes 4 .esp files, only activate one. The default esp provides the additional spells, the _coloured adds coloured versions and the _shadows makes the light spells cast shadows.

To install: Unarchive with winrar into the Skyrim/Data folder. Activate your chosen esp file in the skyrim launcher.

Alternatively you can subscribe to the spell mod in the Steam Workshop
author: Nicholas Udell
